publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-135# Mrs Nanette Milne: Industrial Action at Grampian TV-That the Parliament expresses concern at the prospect of industrial action at Grampian TV and considers that all sides should show restraint while negotiations to find an amicable solution continue.

S2M-135# Mrs Nanette Milne: Industrial Action at Grampian TVâ€”That the Parliament expresses concern at the prospect of industrial action at Grampian TV and considers that all sides should show restraint while negotiations to find an amicable solution continue. Supported by: Brian Adam*, Richard Lochhead*, Alex Johnstone*, John Scott*, Margaret Mitchell*
S2M-135# Industrial Action at Grampian TV (lodged on 12 June 2003) Murdo Fraser*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*, Phil Gallie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-135# Industrial Action at Grampian TV (lodged on 12 June 2003) Shiona Baird*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Mr David Davidson*
S2M-135# Industrial Action at Grampian TV (lodged on 12 June 2003) Miss Annabel Goldie*
